definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: to pester someone again and again
to go begging/to ask for alms
tribe of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people
to request permission to resign from an official position (old)

sentences.english: Who daintier love, shall beggars prove.
sentences.chinese: 对爱抉剔，末将乞之不失。

sentences.english: Qiju is a kind of re-appeal procedural system in Qin and Han Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 乞鞫是秦汉时期的一种再审诉讼制度。

definition: Xingtian, headless giant hero of Chinese mythology decapitated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
